db_read_sql_select: SELECT unique_bill_id,TRIM(UPPER(invs.status_type)) AS status_type,bh.txm_invoice_number AS invoice_number   FROM txm_bitx.invoice_status invs INNER JOIN txm_bitx.bill_header bh ON bh.txm_invoice_number=invs.txm_invoice_number WHERE LOWER(TRIM(bh.trading_partner))='jopari' AND TRIM(UPPER(status_type))='ADJUDICATION' AND TRIM(UPPER(status))='DELETED' AND unique_bill_id IS NOT NULL UNION ALL SELECT unique_bill_id,TRIM(UPPER(invs.status_type)) AS status_type,bh.txm_invoice_number AS invoice_number  FROM txm_bitx.invoice_status invs INNER JOIN txm_bitx.bill_header bh ON bh.txm_invoice_number=invs.txm_invoice_number WHERE LOWER(TRIM(bh.trading_partner))='jopari' AND TRIM(UPPER(status_type))='CLAIM_MATCH_MANUAL' AND TRIM(UPPER(status))='DELETED' AND unique_bill_id IS NOT NULL UNION ALL SELECT unique_bill_id,TRIM(UPPER(invs.status_type)) AS status_type,bh.txm_invoice_number AS invoice_number  FROM txm_bitx.invoice_status invs INNER JOIN txm_bitx.bill_header bh ON bh.txm_invoice_number=invs.txm_invoice_number WHERE LOWER(TRIM(bh.trading_partner))='jopari' AND TRIM(UPPER(status_type))='VENDOR_MATCH_MANUAL' AND TRIM(UPPER(status))='DELETED' AND unique_bill_id IS NOT NULL UNION ALL SELECT unique_bill_id,TRIM(UPPER(invs.status_type)) AS status_type,bh.txm_invoice_number AS invoice_number  FROM txm_bitx.invoice_status invs INNER JOIN txm_bitx.bill_header bh ON bh.txm_invoice_number=invs.txm_invoice_number WHERE LOWER(TRIM(bh.trading_partner))='jopari' AND TRIM(UPPER(status_type))='INDICATED_ATTACHMENT_MISSING' AND TRIM(UPPER(status))='DELETED' AND unique_bill_id IS NOT NULL
